subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: There was not a spot on the floor Friday where Virginia’s J.R. Reynolds could not make a shot. His 28 points on 9 of 13 shooting led the Cavaliers over No. 13 Albany.
snippet: There was not a spot on the floor Friday where Virginia’s J.R. Reynolds could not make a shot. His 28 points on 9 of 13 shooting led the Cavaliers over No. 13 Albany.
